plugins.name: Page Forge
plugins.description:
Create templates for page names and apply them across all your projects.


Especially useful for teams with different types of projects or organizations.


How it works:

Create page templates.

  1. Name the pages in your project as you want them to be replicated throughout your document.
  2. Save the template to use it in other documents.


Apply the template.

  1. Create your document.
  2. Apply the template you want to use.


Export and import templates.

  1. Share your templates with your team.
  2. Import templates created by other users.


---

Documentation here: Documentation

Made by Eduardo Higareda
plugins.tagline: Uniform page names across all your documents

plugins.name: Insta Component
plugins.description:
The Insta Component plugin allows users to create components more easily. For example, when a user runs the plugin on a frame layer, it will create a master component on the side and convert the frame into an instance in the same location.


Thanks to @tang for testing the plugin.
plugins.tagline: create component faster

59637.name: Insta Component
59637.description:
The Insta Component plugin allows users to create components more easily. For example, when a user runs the plugin on a frame layer, it will create a master component on the side and convert the frame into an instance in the same location.


Thanks to @tang for testing the plugin.

Note: You’ll need to bring your own OpenAI API key.
plugins.tagline: Write as you design.  With AI copy suggestions.

plugins.name: Ugly Images
plugins.description:
Your design looks flawless, filled with perfect stock photos… but reality hits different. Users will upload poorly cropped pictures, badly lit selfies, and blurry screenshots. Ugly Images helps you design for the real world—where images are anything but perfect.


🔹 Fill your designs with truly awful images – See how your UI handles the chaos.

🔹 Forget pixel-perfect mockups – Apps rely on user-generated content.

🔹 Break free from the stock photo illusion – Prepare your UI for the unexpected.


Ready to see your design as it will actually look? Try it and embrace the ugly.
plugins.tagline: Mockups Lie. Ugly Images Don't

122612.name: Ugly Images
122612.description:
Your design looks flawless, filled with perfect stock photos… but reality hits different. Users will upload poorly cropped pictures, badly lit selfies, and blurry screenshots. Ugly Images helps you design for the real world—where images are anything but perfect.


🔹 Fill your designs with truly awful images – See how your UI handles the chaos.

🔹 Forget pixel-perfect mockups – Apps rely on user-generated content.

🔹 Break free from the stock photo illusion – Prepare your UI for the unexpected.


Ready to see your design as it will actually look? Try it and embrace the ugly.
122612.release_notes: - FEAT: When element is replaced, we keep focus

plugins.name: Writing Assistant
plugins.description:
The AI Writing tools for designers

It helps you refine your UX copywriting, make it more concise, friendly, and scannable using AI.

  1. Super easy to use, one click to refine the copywriting
  2. 5 variants in one request
  3. Modifications are adjustable from light to heavy


How does it works?

The AI writer will analyze and refine your original content from three metrics: concise, friendly, and scannable. Just one click, you will get the refined copywriting, the changes of score of these three metrics can help you make decision from those 5 refined variants.


Scientifically define good copywriting

The model is base on Microsoft style guide, thanks to the efforts of these talented designers, we are able to know how to evaluate a copywriting and how to improve it.
plugins.tagline: Refine your UX copy writing to make it more concise, friendly and scannable.

plugins.name: StyleSnap - Create AI Icons in Any Style
plugins.description:
Effortlessly create custom icons in any style with StyleSnap – the smart Figma plugin that brings AI-powered icon generation right where you work.


Whether you're designing a sleek UI or crafting a detailed illustration, StyleSnap lets you instantly replicate any icon style and generate new icons in seconds – all royalty-free and within Figma.


Perfect for designers who love consistency, speed, and creativity.


🎯 Right-Click Style Capture: Instantly capture the style of any icon in your Figma file with a simple right-click.


🖌️ AI-Powered Icon Generation: Describe the icon you want, and StyleSnap will create it to match the style you selected – from minimal to highly illustrative.


♾️ Style Agnostic: Works with any style – flat, outlined, detailed, 3D-inspired, or even hand-drawn.


🎨 Perfect for UI & Illustrations: Whether you're building out a clean interface or adding a creative touch, StyleSnap generates icons that feel perfectly on-brand.


🔓 Royalty-Free Icons: All generated icons are yours to use freely, with no licensing worries.


⚡ No Asset Library Needed: Skip the endless searches. Just pick a style, describe your icon, and go.


👨‍🎨 Great for Teams & Solo Designers: Maintain design consistency across projects without extra effort or asset juggling.


How to use the plugin?

  1. Install StyleSnap from the Figma Community.
  2. Right-click on any icon.
  3. Describe the new icon you need.
  4. Let the plugin generate it for you – in the exact style, ready to use and royalty-free.
plugins.tagline: Easily copy any icon style to create new icons in a snap

plugins.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG
plugins.description:
🎨 Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG


Mercurius is a Figma plugin that analyzes and exports images in multiple formats (WEBP, PNG, or JPG) with AI-generated descriptions. The plugin uses OpenAI's API to generate accurate descriptions and suggest meaningful file names while automatically optimizing file size.


Quick Export Mode 📦

For when you just need to export images quickly with optimization


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. Click "Export Image" on the home screen
  3. You'll see: selected frame name, image dimensions, aspect ratio
  4. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  5. Click "Export" to save your optimized image


AI-Powered Export Mode 🤖

For when you want AI assistance with descriptions and smart file naming


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. First-time setup: Enter your OpenAI API key: the key will be securely saved for future use
  3. Click "Analyze Image" on the home screen
  4. The AI will analyze and provide: smart image description, SEO-friendly file name suggestion, image dimensions and aspect ratio
  5. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  6. Click "Export" to save your image with the AI-suggested name



Both modes feature automatic image optimization to meet your file size requirements while maintaining the best possible quality.
plugins.tagline: Smart image analysis and export for WEBP, PNG, or JPG with GPT descriptions and size optimization

125273.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG
125273.description:
🎨 Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG


Mercurius is a Figma plugin that analyzes and exports images in multiple formats (WEBP, PNG, or JPG) with AI-generated descriptions. The plugin uses OpenAI's API to generate accurate descriptions and suggest meaningful file names while automatically optimizing file size.


Quick Export Mode 📦

For when you just need to export images quickly with optimization


  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma
  2. Click "Export Image" on the home screen
  3. You'll see: selected frame name, image dimensions, aspect ratio
  4. Configure export settings: choose format (WEBP, PNG, or JPG), set maximum file size in MB, select export scale (1x, 2x, 3x, 5x)
  5. Click "Export" to save your optimized image


AI-Powered Export Mode 🤖

  1. Select an image, frame, or component in Figma

  6. Click "Export" to save your image with the AI-suggested name



Both modes feature automatic image optimization to meet your file size requirements while maintaining the best possible quality.

manifest.name: Mercurius - Smart Exporter for WEBP, PNG, and JPG

125273.tagline: Smart image analysis and export for WEBP, PNG, or JPG with GPT descriptions and size optimization

plugins.name: Floating Finder
plugins.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.


Figmaでデザイン作業中、「見た目はフレーム内にあるのに、実は外にある」オブジェクトがあると、PDF書き出しした時に消えてしまいます。Floating Finderは、選択した複数フレーム内にある“浮遊オブジェクト”を検出し、修正します。
plugins.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

130130.name: Floating Finder
130130.description:
When designing in Figma, objects that appear to be within a frame but are actually outside of it will disappear when exported to PDF. Floating Finder detects “floating objects” within multiple selected frames and corrects them.

130130.tagline: Detect and Fix Floating Objects Outside Frames

plugins.name: DT组件高亮 DT Component Highlighting
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to visually highlight suspected components within a design, making it easier to locate and manage components. The plugin is ideal for users who need to inspect multiple components and interact with them quickly.


Function Description

•Highlight suspected components in selected frames.

•Locate and zoom into components within your Figma file.

•Export thumbnails of components for visual reference.

•Easily toggle component highlight on and off.


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames from your Figma file.

2.Click the “Show Component Highlight” button to highlight suspected components.

3.View the component list with thumbnails and names.

4.Click the “Locate” button to zoom in and select a specific component.

5.To remove the highlight, click “Hide Component Highlight.”


Notes

•The highlighted components are based on the plugin’s interpretation and might not fully match actual component usage.

•The plugin’s results are for reference purposes and may vary depending on design complexity.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件允许用户在设计中直观地高亮显示疑似组件，帮助轻松定位和管理组件。非常适合需要快速检查和交互多个组件的用户。


功能说明

•在选定的画框中高亮显示疑似组件。

•在 Figma 文件中定位并聚焦到组件。

•导出组件的缩略图以供视觉参考。

•轻松切换组件高亮状态。


使用方法

1.从 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个画框。

2.点击“显示组件高亮”按钮，高亮显示疑似组件。

3.查看带有缩略图和名称的组件列表。

4.点击“定位”按钮，放大并选择特定组件。

5.如需移除高亮，请点击“隐藏组件高亮”。


注意事项

•高亮显示的组件基于插件的解读，可能与实际组件使用情况不完全一致。

  1. •插件结果仅供参考，实际效果可能会因设计复杂性而有所不同。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily Highlight and Manage DT Components in Your Design

plugins.name: PageStream
plugins.description:
The ultimate Figma plugin you need to create, manage, and share Figma file templates. Whether you’re working solo or part of a large team, this plugin ensures consistency and efficiency when creating design projects. Sound interesting? Create your account and run the plug-in


How it works?

  1. Create and activate your account
  2. Go back to Figma
  3. Log in the plugin
  4. Start creating your templates


Why do I need an account?

You need to create an account to save your templates and use them anytime you need.


What you can do with PageStream?

  1. Generate different templates for your teams or kinds of projects.
  2. Edit or delete the different templates.
  3. Drag and drop the pages to reorganize the list easily when editing.
  4. Did we mention that you can SAVE your file templates?
  5. And YES! Of course you can add emojis


Why did we create PageStream?

We’re really passionate about creating and learning new things, and we absolutely love remote work and team collaboration.

We’ve observed that many teams struggle with inconsistent files, which can make cross-functional and team collaboration a bit tricky. Moreover, all designers know that spending time creating pages can be pretty tedious. So, we challenged ourselves to solve these two problems over the weekend.


We have ideas for the next version, but please, if you have any recommendations or feedback, let us know. We hope you find this plugin handy!


Enjoy the day!
plugins.tagline: Create and save templates for your design file structure.

plugins.name: Randominator
plugins.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
plugins.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

132327.name: Randominator
132327.description:
🎨 Randominator - The Ultimate Figma Randomization Tool


Transform your designs with powerful randomization capabilities! Randominator lets you quickly create variations of your selected elements with just a few clicks.


✨ Features:


🎯 Transform Properties

• Scale: Randomize size between 0.1x and 4x

• Rotation: Set custom angle ranges from -180° to 180°

• Lock Aspect Ratio option for proportional scaling


🎨 Color Properties

• Fill Colors: Randomize HSL values and opacity

• Stroke Colors: Independent control over stroke colors

• Fine-tune color variation with:

- Hue Range (0-1)

- Saturation Range (0-1)

- Lightness Range (0-1)

- Alpha/Opacity Range (0-1)


📑 Layer Management

• Randomize layer stacking order

• Works with multiple selected objects

• Maintains object center positions


🔄 Perfect for:

• Creating design variations

• Generating unique patterns

• Exploring different color combinations

• Adding organic movement to your designs

• Quick prototyping and ideation


💡 Pro Tips:

• Select multiple objects to randomize them together

• Use small ranges for subtle variations

• Combine different properties for unique results

• Works with Frames, Components, Instances, and Groups
132327.release_notes:
🎉 New Update: Randominator v1.1.0

We're excited to bring you new randomization features to make your designs even more dynamic!

✨ New Features:
• Rotation Randomization: Add random rotation to your selected elements with customizable min/max angles
• Layer Order Randomization: Shuffle the stacking order of your selected layers for quick variations
• Improved Scale Behavior: More intuitive scaling with better default values

🛠️ UI Improvements:
• Updated interface layout for better usability
• Reset default color randomization values for more predictable results
• Enhanced slider controls for better precision

Try these new features by selecting multiple elements and adjusting the rotation range or enabling layer order randomization in the plugin panel.

Happy randomizing! 🎨
132327.tagline: 🎲 Randomize colors, scale, rotation, and layer order with a single click

plugins.name: Color Contrast Analyzer
plugins.description: Color Contrast Analyzer helps you quickly evaluate and improve the accessibility of your designs by measuring color contrast ratios in accordance with WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines). When accessibility fails, it suggests alternative colors to ensure your text is readable and meets accessibility standards—all within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Check & Fix Color Contrast for Accessible Designs

plugins.name: FillGPT
plugins.description:
FillGPT is an AI-powered Figma plugin designed to improve workflow efficiency by automating content generation, text optimization, and design analysis. It helps designers, copywriters, and product teams enhance UI copy, rename layers, and analyze design best practices.


Key features:


- Smart layer renaming to keep files organized

- AI-generated content for UI elements and marketing copy

- Copy enhancement, including expanding, shortening, and rephrasing text

- Tone and style adjustment to match different contexts

- Design analysis to improve clarity, accessibility, and readability

- Grammar and spelling error detection and correction

- Text summarization and expansion for better content flow


FillGPT streamlines the design process, ensuring high-quality text and a more efficient workflow within Figma.

plugins.name: Round to 8
plugins.description:
Round to 8 helps you maintain consistent spacing and measurements in your designs by automatically rounding values to multiples of 4, 8, or any custom value.


🎯 Key Features:

• Round multiple properties at once:

- Auto Layout (Padding & Spacing)

- Position (X & Y coordinates)

- Size (Width & Height)

- Font Size

- All Properties option


🎨 Flexible Options:

• Choose your rounding multiple:

- Multiple of 4

- Multiple of 8 (recommended for most designs)

- Custom value for specific needs


🔍 Smart Selection:

• Apply to selected elements only

• Include all children elements

• Preserve component instances


💡 Perfect For:

• Maintaining consistent spacing in design systems

• Cleaning up imported designs

• Ensuring pixel-perfect layouts

• Standardizing measurements across teams


⚡️ Quick Tips:

1. Select any frame or component

2. Choose properties to round

3. Pick your preferred multiple

4. Click Apply and watch the magic happen!


Made with ❤️ for the Figma Community
plugins.tagline: Round your design values to consistent multiples for pixel-perfect layouts

110609.name: Round to 8

plugins.name: Multiple Text Clone Components
plugins.description:
Summary

Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

When multiple lines of text are entered, they are duplicated with “1 line = 1 component”.

Example: Running with 3 lines of text will duplicate 3 components


コンポーネントを複製して事前に入力したテキストを挿入するプラグインです。

複数行のテキストを入力すると「1行=1コンポーネント」で複製されます。

例：3行分のテキストを入力すると3つのコンポーネントが複製される


Use

  1. Create Components
  2. Place text inside components or add text properties
  3. Enter the text you want to duplicate in the plugin panel
  4. Select and run the component created in 2.


  1. コンポーネントを作成
  2. コンポーネントの中にテキストを配置、もしくはテキストプロパティを追加
  3. 複製したいテキストをプラグインパネルに入力
  4. 2で作成したコンポーネントを選択して実行
plugins.tagline: Plug-in to duplicate a component and insert text.

110186.name: Multiple Text Clone Components
110186.description:

  3. Enter the text you want to duplicate in the plugin panel
  4. Select and run the component created in 2.

  2. コンポーネントの中にテキストを配置、もしくはテキストプロパティを追加

plugins.name: Color Me Softly
plugins.description: The plugin extracts the dominant color from an image using the ColorThief algorithm, reduces its opacity to 0.3 (against a white background), and converts the adjusted color to a hex value you can use in your designs. It’s great for creating subtle backgrounds for images.
plugins.tagline: Tiny little helper to generate a soft color tone based on the dominant color of an image

101853.description: The plugin extracts the dominant color from an image using the ColorThief algorithm, reduces its opacity to 0.3 (against a white background), and converts the adjusted color to a hex value you can use in your designs. It’s great for creating subtle backgrounds for images.

plugins.name: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Assets Connector
plugins.description:
The free Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Assets Connector allows you to access your organization’s assets directly within Figma. Easily browse, search, filter, and drag and drop assets from AEM Assets into your Figma designs – all without leaving your workflow.


You can also export your final designs from Figma and upload them directly to designated folders in AEM Assets, making it simple to share, manage, and version your creative work across teams.


Supported formats (will be expanded in future releases):

Import from AEM Assets to Figma: JPG, PNG.

Export from Figma to AEM Assets: PNG, PDF, JPG, SVG.
plugins.tagline: Access your assets from and save new designs to AEM

136135.name: Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Assets Connector
136135.description:
The free Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) Assets Connector allows you to access your organization’s assets directly within Figma. Easily browse, search, filter, and drag and drop assets from AEM Assets into your Figma designs – all without leaving your workflow.


You can also export your final designs from Figma and upload them directly to designated folders in AEM Assets, making it simple to share, manage, and version your creative work across teams.


Supported formats (will be expanded in future releases):

Import from AEM Assets to Figma: JPG, PNG.

Export from Figma to AEM Assets: PNG, PDF, JPG, SVG.

networkAccess.reasoning: Access to AEM Adobe Assets services for asset downloads and uploads

136135.tagline: Access your assets from and save new designs to AEM

plugins.name: Smiley Express
plugins.description:
Smiley Express - Hop On and Pick a Mood!


Bring personality and hand-drawn charm to your Figma designs with Smiley Express: a fun, free collection of expressive smileys for every emotion.


Whether you're feeling happy, sad, calm, or angry, there's a face for it. Each smiley is lovingly illustrated and grouped by mood, so you can find exactly what your design needs.


Pick your favorite color combo or tweak it directly in Figma.


🖤 Open-source & community-driven! Check out the code or contribute: https://github.com/ko-ko-lo/figma-smiley-express

accepted.name: Denise Kolodzey
accepted.description:
👋 Hi! 
I’m a UX Engineer with a love for thoughtful tools and beautiful details.
I build Figma plugins that make workflows smoother and design more fun.

plugins.tagline: Hand-drawn smileys for every mood. Pick a color, drop it in Figma, express yourself!

plugins.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
plugins.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
plugins.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

129143.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
129143.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
129143.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

127447.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
127447.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
127447.release_notes: Fixed the issue where framed text that has a background fill would be misinterpreted as text on white background.
127447.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

plugins.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
plugins.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!

accepted.name: Muhammad Faizan Atiq
accepted.description: Hey there! I’m a design nerd with a big love for systems that turn ideas into magic. Every pixel counts, every pattern tells a story!

plugins.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

126526.name: FigTidy - Organize your Figma Pages
126526.description:
Tired of manually rearranging frames or creating sections? FigTidy automates your layout process so you can focus on designing. Quickly organise frames, add consistent spacing/padding, and create new sections in empty areas—no overlap required.


Features

• Automatic Arrangement: Choose horizontal or vertical layouts, plus advanced settings like max width and spacing.

• Section Creation: Add a background colour, corner radius, and a clear section title—perfect for design system docs or style guides.

• No Overlaps: FigTidy scans for existing sections, then places your new section in an empty spot.

• Advanced Settings: Tweak spacing, padding, and max width in an accordion panel for a neat UI.


Made with ❤️ by Faizan – Because every Figma page deserves a tidy layout!
126526.release_notes:
Release Notes v2.0.0

✨ New Features:
• Create sections with custom background colors
• Organize elements horizontally or vertically
• Adjust spacing and padding between elements
• Set maximum section width for better layout control

🛠️ Improvements:
• Sections are created exactly where you select elements
• Consistent spacing between rows in horizontal layout
• Smooth color picker with preset swatches
• Modern dark theme UI with glassmorphism effects

🐛 Fixed:
• Section positioning now matches native Figma behavior
• Color picker no longer gets cropped in the UI
• Layout spacing issues in multi-row sections
126526.tagline: Arrange frames, add sections, and tidy your pages—fast

plugins.name: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc
plugins.description: Export SVG to Power BI by ventriloc streamlines the process of integrating custom SVG's visuals into Power BI. Instead of manually recreating designs, simply export your Figma frame as an SVG, paste it into a Power BI measure, and tweak the code to incorporate dynamic elements like measures and variables. This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.

This tool is perfect for designers and analysts who want full creative control over their Power BI visuals without the hassle of complex coding. Want to see more of what ventriloc can do? Visit our website ventriloc.ca !
125856.tagline: Effortlessly export Figma frames to Power BI as editable SVGs for dynamic, custom visuals.

plugins.name: Custom Table Generator
plugins.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
plugins.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.

127112.name: Custom Table Generator
127112.description:
Custom Table Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that lets you design complex, fully customizable tables—without importing JSON, CSV, or any external data.


Designed for designers who demand precision and flexibility, this plugin gives you a smooth UI for building table structures from scratch, component by component.


Key features:

🧱 Component-friendly: build using Figma components, variants, and auto layout


🔧 Drag-and-drop column and row control


🎨 Full styling options: borders, spacing, colors, typography, alignment


📐 Advanced layout support (nested cells, merged rows, sticky headers, etc.)
127112.tagline: Build complex, beautiful tables—without touching code or data files.
